keyword: how many calories in 4 oz of salmon
title: How Many Calories in 4 oz of Salmon?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 4 oz of salmon, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and preparation tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in 4 oz of Salmon?
assumptions: Atlantic salmon fillet, cooked (baked or grilled), skinless, no added oil or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by salmon type (wild vs. farmed), cooking method, portion size, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 4 oz of cooked salmon provides ~233 kcal and ~25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 4 oz

faqs.q: How many calories in 4 oz cooked salmon?
faqs.a: Approximately 233 kcal for baked, skinless Atlantic salmon.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 4 oz of salmon?

faqs.a: No significant carbsâ€”0 g in 4 oz.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect salmon calories?
faqs.a: Baking or grilling keeps calories lower; frying with oil adds ~40-50 kcal per 4 oz.

faqs.q: Wild vs. farmed salmon calorie difference?
faqs.a: Wild is leaner (~180 kcal per 100 g) vs. farmed (~206 kcal per 100 g).
